valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 29 Oct 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 30 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low moving rather quickly northeast expected just west of Shannon 962 by midday tomorrow. Lows Cromarty 989, northwest Ireland 991 and Southeast Iceland 998 losing their identities
